views.markdown: A CC module/Flipswitch tweak (similar to Amber) to always have the maximum LEDs brightness (i.e., using high current) for quad-LEDs devices. An example is when you turn on the light in video recording mode of the stock camera app. For iPhone 7 and newer, iPad Pro 12.9" (2nd Gen) and newer.
- Fixed potential crashing on H11ISP and newer camera devices
